latestAction.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study to assess the suitability and feasibility of establishing the African Burial Ground International Memorial Museum and Educational Center at the African Burial Ground National Monument, and for other purposes.
ai_summary: The bill would establish the African Burial Ground International Memorial Museum and Educational Center. The bill would also establish a National Monument at the site of the burial ground. The study would assess the suitability and feasibility of establishing the museum and national monument. It would also be used for other purposes, such as to establish a museum and educational center at the burial site. It was passed by the House of Representatives and the Senate with a vote of 98-0. It is the first time the Senate has voted on the bill in more than a decade.
